nodes.text: Lexo Sooger was a Dor Namethian male who was the star masseur at Zord's Spa and Bathhouse in Canto Bight. Sooger used to be an assassin. He found a human on his doorstep and took her in, calling her Lula. He was sought by the gangster Sturg Ganna, who eventually kidnapped Lula.
Lexo Sooger first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, the second installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. He was portrayed by Dee Tails.[source?]
